greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number A(n,k) of partitions of n with up to k distinct kinds of 1; square array A(n,k), n>=0, k>=0, read by antidiagonals.
comment: For fixed k>=0, A(n,k) ~ Pi * 2^(k - 5/2) * exp(Pi*sqrt(2*n/3)) / (3 * n^(3/2)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 24 2018
link: Alois P. Heinz, Antidiagonals n = 0..140, flattened
formula: G.f. of column k: (1 + x)^k * Product_{j>=2} 1 / (1 - x^j). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Apr 24 2021
maple: b:= proc(n, i, k) option remember; `if`(n=0 or i=1,
binomial(k, n), `if`(i>n, 0, b(n-i, i, k))+b(n, i-1, k))
mathematica: b[n_, i_, k_] := b[n, i, k] = If[n == 0 || i == 1, Binomial[k, n], If[i > n, 0, b[n - i, i, k]] + b[n, i - 1, k]];
Table[A[n, d - n], {d, 0, 14}, {n, 0, d}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 19 2018, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 20 2017
